events.message: I received my new blender today but the blade is already bent and it doesn't blend properly.
The reported issue is categorized as a product defect due to a bent blade causing malfunction.
Your case has been assigned to a customer service agent who will assist you further.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your blender. Iâ€™m here to help get this resolved quickly.
Could you please provide a photo of the bent blade and confirm when you received the package?
Attached is a photo showing the bent blade. I got the package this morning, and it looks damaged on arrival.
Thank you for the photo. We can send you a replacement blender immediately or offer a full refund. Please let us know your preference.
I would prefer a replacement sent as soon as possible. Thanks for the quick response.
Your replacement blender has been shipped today with expedited delivery. Tracking details have been emailed to you.
We wanted to check in and ensure that your replacement blender arrived in good condition and is working properly.
The replacement arrived yesterday and works perfectly. Thanks for your help resolving this.
We are closing this case now. Please reach out anytime if you need further assistance. Have a great day!
